HealthScoreActionLog.name: HealthScoreActionLog
HealthScoreActionLog.description: Represents the log of actions triggered from the Dynamic Actions for Unified Health Scoring component in the Unified Health Scoring feature.

ActionDate.description: The date and time when the action was triggered by an end user.

ActionDescription.description: The description of the triggered action, as defined by the admin.

ActionIconUrl.description: The URL of triggered action’s icon, as defined by the admin.

ActionLabel.description: The label of the triggered action, as defined by the admin.

ActionName.description: The API name of the triggered action, as defined by the admin.

ActionStatus.description: The status of the triggered action. The default value is ‘triggered’. To update the status to another value, set up a custom trigger or process.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time the record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the log record.

PerformedById.description: The user who triggered the action.

Score.description: The score of the subject who the action was triggered for. This field isn’t populated in logs by default. Customize the action logging capability of Unified Health Scoring to use this field.

ScoreCategoryId.description: The score category of a score of the subject who the action was triggered for. This field isn’t populated in logs by default. Customize the action logging capability of Unified Health Scoring to use this field.

SubjectId.description: The subject who the action was triggered for.

TargetAccountId.description: If the subject is an account, the account record of the subject.

TargetContactId.description: If the subject is an contact, the contact record of the subject.

TargetLeadId.description: If the subject is an lead, the lead record of the subject.
